DOC.brief_summary: This study is a one-day international cross-sectional nutritional audit in one ward. The purpose of this study is to generate a risk and level of nutritional intervention profile for an individual unit/ward based on case-mix, structures and social environment.
DOC.brief_title: Nutrition Day in Hospitals, Nursing Homes and Community. Israel January 2010
DOC.criteria: A adult patients within the unit from 7H00 to 7H00 Patients younger than 18 years Patients admitted and discharged during same calendar day
DOC.keyword: Nutritional status of ward patients and hospitalization outcome
